title: AI Ecosystem Engineer - Worldwide Developer Relations
summary: Apple is where individual imaginations gather together, committing to the values that lead to great work. Every new product we build, service we create, or Apple Store experience we deliver is the result of us making each other’s ideas stronger...
description: In this role, you will support the development of world-class third party apps by bridging developers to framework engineering teams, enabling them to create the most innovative apps using Apple technologies while ensuring exceptional user experiences...
preferred_qualifications: Familiarity with or experience in Machine Learning (ML) and related technologies. Experience with core frameworks such as Foundation, CoreAnimation, SwiftUI, AppKit, and UIKit. Understanding of API / SPI design and implementation. Experience testing technology stacks with many software and hardware components...
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $121,909 and $214,500 annualized, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location...
